trans-unit.source: Represents a security token that is based upon key that is created using the RSA algorithm.

Typically, application developers do not need to use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityToken> class, unless a Web service must get the RSA algorithm that is associated with the security token.
trans-unit.target: In genere gli sviluppatori di applicazioni non hanno bisogno di utilizzare la classe <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityToken>, a meno che un servizio Web non debba ottenere l'algoritmo RSA associato al token di sicurezza.

trans-unit.source: To get the RSA algorithm, get the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityToken.Rsa%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere l'algoritmo RSA, ottenere il valore della proprietà <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityToken.Rsa%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityToken" /> class.
A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> that represents a RSA algorithm that is capable of creating an asymmetric key.
Sets the value of the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityToken.Rsa" /> property.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityToken" /> class using the specified RSA algorithm.
This constructor generates a unique identifier for the security token and sets that to the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityToken.Id%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore genera un identificatore univoco del token di sicurezza e lo imposta sul valore della proprietà <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityToken.Id%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rsa" /> is <see langword="null" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> that represents a RSA algorithm that is capable of creating an asymmetric key.
Sets the value of the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityToken.Rsa" /> property.
A unique identifier of the security token.
Sets the value of the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityToken.Id" /> property.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityToken" /> class using the specified RSA algorithm and unique identifier.
<paramref name="rsa" /> is <see langword="null" />.
-or-
<paramref name="id" /> is <see langword="null" />.
A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> that specifies the type of key identifier to create.
trans-unit.target: Elemento <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> che specifica il tipo di identificatore di chiave da creare.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this security token is capable of creating the specified key identifier.
<see langword="true" /> when <paramref name="T" /> is of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaKeyIdentifierClause" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
To create the key identifier clause, call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityToken.CreateKeyIdentifierClause%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per creare la clausola identificatore di chiave, chiamare il metodo <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityToken.CreateKeyIdentifierClause%2A>.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> that specifies the key identifier to create.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> che specifica l'identificatore di chiave da creare.

trans-unit.source: Creates the specified key identifier clause.
A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaKeyIdentifierClause" /> that is a key identifier clause for the security token.

To determine whether the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityToken> class can create the specified key identifier clause, call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityToken.CanCreateKeyIdentifierClause%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per stabilire se la classe <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityToken> è in grado di creare la clausola identificatore di chiave specificata, chiamare il metodo <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityToken.CanCreateKeyIdentifierClause%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Allows the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityToken" /> to free resources before it is destroyed by the garbage collector.
Gets a unique identifier of the security token.
A unique identifier of the security token.
trans-unit.target: Identificatore univoco del token di sicurezza.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the key identifier for this instance matches the specified key identifier.

<see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="keyIdentifierClause" /> is of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaKeyIdentifierClause" /> and the keys match; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Gets a RSA algorithm that is capable of creating an asymmetric key.
A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> that represents a RSA algorithm that is capable of creating an asymmetric key.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> che rappresenta un algoritmo RSA in grado di creare una chiave asimmetrica.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cryptographic keys associated with the security token.

A <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey" /> that contains the set of keys associated with the security token.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> di tipo <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey" /> che contiene un set di chiavi associato al token di sicurezza.

trans-unit.source: The collection contains an asymmetric key that is created using the RSA algorithm.
trans-unit.target: La raccolta contiene una chiave asimmetrica creata utilizzando l'algoritmo RSA.

trans-unit.source: The key is of type <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityKey>.
Gets the first instant in time at which this security token is valid.
A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that represents the instant in time at which this security token is first valid.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> che rappresenta l'indicazione del momento a partire dal quale il token di sicurezza è valido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A> property is set to the instant in time when the security token is created in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A> viene impostata sull'ora esatta in cui viene creato il token di sicurezza nel formato UTC (Coordinated Universal Time).

trans-unit.source: Gets the last instant in time at which this security token is valid.
A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that represents the last instant in time at which this security token is valid.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> che rappresenta l'indicazione del momento fino al quale il token di sicurezza è valido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityToken> security token never expires.
trans-unit.target: Il token di sicurezza <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.RsaSecurityToken> non scade mai.
